title: JSON schema for schema.org / Organization
description: This is a JSON schema representation of the schema.org Organization schema: https://schema.org/Organization

@context.description: override the @context property to ensure the schema.org URI is used

@type.description: override the @type property to ensure Person is used

aggregateRating.description: The overall rating, based on a collection of reviews or ratings, of the item. (AggregateRating)

areaServed.description: The geographic area where a service or offered item is provided.

award.description: An award won by or for this item.

contactPoint.description: A contact point for a person or organization.

department.description: A relationship between an organization and a department of that organization, also described as an organization (allowing different urls, logos, opening hours).

dissolutionDate.description: The date that this organization was dissolved.

duns.description: The Dun & Bradstreet DUNS number for identifying an organization or business person.

event.description: Upcoming or past event associated with this place, organization, or action.

founder.description: A person who founded this organization.

founding Date.description: The date that this organization was founded.

foundingLocation.description: The place where the Organization was founded.

funder.description: A person or organization that supports (sponsors) something through some kind of financial contribution.

globalLocationNumber.description: The Global Location Number (GLN), sometimes referred to as International Location Number (ILN) of the respective organization, person, or place. The GLN is a 13-digit number used to identify parties and physical locations.

hasOfferCatalog.description: Indicates an OfferCatalog listing for this Organization, Person, or Service.

hasPOS.description: Points-Of-Sales operated by thei organization or person.

isicV4.description: The International Standard of Industrial Classification of All Economic Activities (ISIC), Revision 4 code for a particular organization, business person, or place.

legalName.description: The official name of the organization.

leiCode.description: An organization identifier that uniquely identifies a legal entity as defined in ISO 17442.

location.description: The location of for example where the event is happening, an organization is located, or where an action takes place.

makesOffer.description: A pointer to products or services offered by the organization or person (Offer).
makesOffer.title: array

member.description: A member of an Organization or a ProgramMembership. Organizations can be members of Organizations; ProgramMembership is typically for individuals.

memberOf.description: An Organization (or ProgramMembership) to which this Person or Organization belongs.

naics.description: The North American Industry Classification System (NAICS) code for a particular organization or person.

numberOfEmployees.description: The number of employees in an organization (eg. business).

owns.description: Products owned by the organization or person.

parentOrganization.description: The larger organization that this local business is a branch of, if any.

seeks.description: A pointer to products or services sought by the organization or person (Demand).

sponsor.description: A person or organization that supports a thing through a pledge, promise, or financial contribution.

subOrganization.description: A relationship between two organizations where the first includes the second.

taxID.description: The Tax/Fiscal ID of the organization or person (eg. the TIN in the US or the CIF/NIF in Spain).

vatID.description: The Value-added Tax ID of the organization or person.
